title: Baby red dragon

properties.name: description
properties.value: Baby red dragons are located in the Brimhaven Dungeon, Forthos Dungeon and in the basement of the Myths' Guild. They have the same combat level as the baby blue dragons that inhabit the Taverley Dungeon.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Baby red dragon
This article is about the standard baby reds. For the baby reds that can be built in player-owned houses, see Baby red dragon (Construction).
 This article has a Slayer task guide here.
Information comparing locations for Slayer tasks will be on this page

Baby red dragons are located in the Brimhaven Dungeon, Forthos Dungeon and in the basement of the Myths' Guild. They have the same combat level as the baby blue dragons that inhabit the Taverley Dungeon.

Players seeking baby dragon bones often choose to fight their blue counterparts as the possibility of red dragons or wild dogs attacking and the need for an axe and 875 to gain entry to the area deters many players. There are safespots for rangers and mages, but players may still be attacked by wild dogs. These monsters, like all dragons, are best attacked using stab or ranged attacks.

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Babydragon bones1Always8180

Tertiary[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Tattered moon page11/25[1] [d 1] [d 2]Not sold1
Tattered sun page11/25[1] [d 1] [d 2]Not sold1
Tattered temple page11/25[1] [d 1] [d 2]Not sold1
Grubby key11/80[1] [d 1] [d 2]42,36619
Brimstone key11/640[d 3][2]Not soldN/A
  1. ^ 1.0 1.1 1.2 1.3 Tattered pages and grubby keys are only dropped by those found in the Forthos Dungeon.
  2. ^ 2.0 2.1 2.2 2.3 The drop rate to receive any tattered page is 1/25. When rolled, the player will receive the page they have the fewest of.
  3. ^ Only dropped if killed on a Slayer task given by Konar quo Maten.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
29 January 2020
(update)

The NPC name was changed back from "Baby dragon" to "Baby red dragon" to accommodate colourblind players.

29 August 2006
(update)
  • The NPC was renamed from "Baby red dragon" to "Baby dragon".
  • The NPC's combat level was decreased from 65 to 48.

  2. ^ Jagex. Mod Kieren's Twitter account. 16 January 2019. (Archived from the original on 29 April 2020.) Mod Kieren: "0.2*(CBLEVEL - 100)^2 + 100"
